Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: DGator
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes darn good devices and this camera is one of them. For a point and shoot camera the DV150 produces good crisp, sharp, clean pictures. It is easy to use and easy to navigate the menu. The video this camera takes is also clean and crisp. Even though it shoots 720p resolution you will not be dis appointed. As with any point and shoot camera lighting is important when using the video function. The lower the lighting the "grainier" the video will look. Also make sure you get a Class 10 card for your camera. Why you ask well it is simple, you want a card that has a fast "read/write" speed so your video and pictures will come out as good as possible. Some people may say you do not need a class 10 but they are wrong!! I use Sandisc cards myself do not buy a "no name" card I know that they are cheaper but you get what you pay for. So stick with a brand name class 10 card you will not regret it. Overall this point and shoot camera is a great buy, is it the best? no, but you will be pleased with this camera. Looking for a Vlogging camera? This camera will do the job! As mentioned before it records up to 720p and has a small LCD screen on the front to help you get into frame. Great camera at a great price.

Reviews.Title: This Tiny Camera Is A Titan In Disguise
Reviews.Author: charger
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I wanted an easy to use Point and Shoot Digital Camera. I relied on the many reviews to make my purchase. There were many  positive reviews, and the only negative review that appeared many times was this camera does not take take great Flash pictures, and there is a lag with the use of the Flash. Well Out of many flash pics that I took, I had one, but all of my flash pics came out great. I have not learned how to use all of the functions like the WiFi that will send a pic to a nearby Smartphone, but for the price I paid, I am well pleased and satisfied. This camera came with no driver for the PC because it doesn't need one. This is great because many times when you buy a new P.C. you will have lost the Driver Disk. We really liked the front screen that lets you get those personal portrait shots with looking stupid, or using a mirror. The little animated video in the front screen is just an added touch for capturing the excitement of young children. This was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love it ..
Reviews.Author: dp102
Reviews.Content: The camera is marvelous and easy to use, I also have a Galaxy S3 phone and Tab 2 tablet and it all integrates together wonderfully.  It has become my primary kick around camera, keeping it with me all the time in my backpack brief case etc.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Sherrin
Reviews.Content: So far, I love it.  It has LOTS of bells and whistles so I am still learning it.  Love that I can post directly online from the camera and if you like to take "selfies" this camera even does that.

Reviews.Title: I like this little camera
Reviews.Author: RT "RapidCityMom"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera for the price.  It has a lot of fun features such as diferent filters and frames you can put into your pictures, which is fun.  The photos come out clear and it has a fairly fast shutter speed in regular shooting mode.  I had no problem connecting to the internet or sending pictures to my phone and e-mail address.  I really like the live panoramic mode of this camera, it is by far the easiest panoramic picture mode I have used.  While it is true that it doesnt come with a lot of written instruction, I registered mine with Samsung when it arrived and they sent me the links to download the manual as well as to their tip and trouble shooting pages.  Also, the camera itself pretty much walks you through set up and what the different modes are.  It also notified me of a firmware update which I was able to easily download.  So far I am pretty impressed with this camera.  The only reason I didnt give it a 5 star rating is that the zoom is not the best.  Its okay, but I have a Fuji which has a much better zoom feature.

Reviews.Title: I totally endorse Samsung Cameras
Reviews.Author: Giselle
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Samsung Camera. My first camera was a Kodak Easy share and that was no competition for Samsung. I changed my first Samsung camera to upgrade to more MP and the second one was stolen. I did not hesitate to buy another Samsung Camera. The one that was stolen was also a dualview and I love that feature. That camera was extremely durable... It fell, it went through water and it WORKED!!! The battery life was awesome as well.... For all these reasons I bought another Samsung camera. And again I was not disappointed! It's pretty in purple, takes amazing pictures, EASY to use and it works on wifi networks for all social media!

Reviews.Title: So fun I have two more!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Wolfe
Reviews.Content: This was the first of the 3 Samsung Dual View cameras I have purchased.  It has great zoom, lots of fun scene features like panorama and frames, and is wifi ready. On a recent trip to NYC, even though I was lugging around my big dslr, it was this camera we reached for time after time.  My daughter and I could easily put ourselves into all of the great landmark shots because of the front screen, which is awesome for selfies.  Not sure if this is the proper venue for this comment, but I will never order from Worldwide Distributors again.  Two terrible experiences on this camera order resulted in having to reorder from a different seller through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Works great, takes a little getting used to.
Reviews.Author: eriesisgod
Reviews.Content: Once you figure out the menu and options you will be much happier with it. Does everything it said it would, don't expect a DSLR. Motion picture took me awhile to figure out. Read the manual!!!

Reviews.Title: Great little camer!!!
Reviews.Author: A. Junco
Reviews.Content: Have had the camera for a month or so, and I love it.  Had a little technical issues with the last software upgrade and the camera is a bit fussy about what ad card brand, speed you use but once you figure it all out, took me about 4 day of trial and error, this is a very feature packed camera.Image quality: very good.  About what you would expect from a simple point and shoot pocket camer 16.2 mp on the small CMOS is good not great.Speed of operation: as expected.  Takes about 2-3 sec to fire up from off to being able to take first picture.Focus:  not bad not fully accurate.  Have taken some fuzzy pics when in full auto mode.  But you can adjust a lot of features in the menu screens.Wifi:  works great!! Upload to Facebook no problem, transfer pictures to iPad iPhone no problem, back up to computer, no problem.Features:  this camera is relatively easy to use and has so many features I can not list them and for under a hundred bucks this camera is totally worth it!!!!I would gladly recommend to anyone with a little tech knowledge and patience.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Great lightweight point and shoot camera. Still learning all the bells and whistles. Took some great pictures the other day, and with the Samsung start camera app. was able to transfer pictures to my smart phone and post them to Facebook. There are lots of options, panorama mode is cool. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Unlimited WiFi & Front LCD HD Screen
Reviews.Author: alex 3D
Reviews.Content: Based on my personal experience, pairing this awesome camera with my iPad 3 and my desktop computer, its WiFi feature is amazing.Pros:#1. Its built-in wifi feature is independent, which means no internet connection is needed to have the wifi set up between the camera and a wifi enabled desktop / laptop computer, and wifi enabled ios / android devices, and wifi enable portable hard drives.#2. Follow provided instruction, it is pretty easy to set up wifi connection between the camera and my ipad 3. As every picture is taken, it is automatically upload to my wifi enabled device, which is my ipad 3 without any need for an internet signal.#3. The switchable front and back LCD screens are awesome, both screens can be on at the same time.#4. There are many high end features built-in with this camera, many adjustments can be selected for own preference.#5. It is inexpensive.#6. Micro memory card slot is available for any Micro SDHC cards, up to 64 GB. I am pairing it with a class-10 16 GB extreme micro SDHC card.#7. The design is pretty and comfy for my hands.#8. No need to look at those super expensive eye-fi cards any more.Cons:#1. As the product description indicates, it is not waterproof, nor water resistant.#2. It does not come with a free external memory card. Buy your own. They are inexpensive at all.Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: great pictures
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: just received this camera and so far so good.takes great pictures and zooms in nicely.only draw back to me  is it very small but very portable i guess .

Reviews.Title: Oh so easy
Reviews.Author: BostonBoy
Reviews.Content: I have wanted a new camera only to have wifi capability which my old camera did not. I looked at reviews for the new wifi version of my old camera but they did not sound positive - hard to get wifi to connect. The reviews for this camera did and so far, I am finding this true. I have spend just about 15 minutes exploring the basics without a manual and everything is so intuitive. I was able to successfully link to my home wifi network and email myself a test picture. It also presents a list of photo storage services which I plan to explore. Will report back to confirm uploading to one of these services is also easy. Thanks Samsung! (I bought the kit version of this on amazon but the camera is the same)

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: Andreinac13 "Andreina C."
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing! I like that it has 2 screens. The front one is good for selfies. I like that is compact.  I like that it has a lot of features like frames and backgrounds and stuff that I haven't used yet, but I can't wait to use it. I like that it has wi-fi connection and you can post pics. online or send it on a e-mail right away.I like the fact that it comes with a electrical plug, so you have the choice of charging it on your PC or the wall.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Christmas gift and very budget friendly!!
Reviews.Author: Just Another Modest Mom
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera! My husband bought it as a Christmas gift for me, the pictures are absolutely fantastic and very clear. I was using a cell phone before this point, after my old camera died on me, and did not realize the damage I was doing to precious moments. I recently printed off a bunch of my photos captured by cell phone and was heart broken that they images were beyond unrecognizable. This camera is easy on the budget and great at it's job.Pros:Love that I can rotate and resize photos on the camera.I can send my photo to Facebook or Email by camera.Images are very clear and crisp.Great price.Comes in a variety of colors and purple is a lovely color on this camera.Cons:The only con I had was that it's a micro card and I have trouble keeping up with just the bigger cards. Other than that, I haven't found a con with this product.

Reviews.Title: just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: bahiamar
Reviews.Content: Just got the item and it was so easy to use. It 's user friendly. Gets great photos and videos. I would give this as future gifts to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Kaitlin McNary
Reviews.Content: I love all the cool features it has and the color. Its very fun and easy to use. i love it!

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Pictures when using Zoom
Reviews.Author: J McKee
Reviews.Content: Camera takes good pictures when it is used without zoom and does not have the ability to adequately compensate for camera shake. I have never had a camera that was so sensitive when taking long distance pictures. I don't like it at all.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't buy again
Reviews.Author: L. Sunday
Reviews.Content: I picked this camera for the wifi & point & shoot capabilities.  I upgraded from an older Kodak that just won't hold a charge.  I find myself using the Kodak, because most of my pictures are of children.  The Samsung does not take good pictures of children who won't sit still, or action shots, or anything with possible movement.  It has a lot of features I never use, but if you like that kind of thing & take pictures of unmoving things this camera is ok.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Carlos Lara
Reviews.Content: the quality is very good, i love this camera is very easy to use and the best is the dual LCD

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Beismann
Reviews.Content: compact and has lots of features. took great pics of my kids sledding. going to be keeping this camera in my purse.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: terri l. selvey
Reviews.Content: I agree 100% with the person who said the instructions that come with this camera are horrible.  I, too, have spent about a week off and on trying to teach myself how to work this camera to send photos out.  I have finally figured it out and it works like a charm and I LOVE it.  The reason I only gave 4 stars is because you have to kind of be a technowizard to figure it out.  I still haven't figured out the front display, it totally eludes me, but I hope I will stumble onto it one day, probably by accident.  Nice sharp pictures though and lightweight.  Slips easily into a pocket or a purse.  Picture quality probably compares to my Sony, which is bigger and heavier so I don't carry it with me much.

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Ticky85
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before buying this camera and for the most part it seemed like a decent point and shoot camera.I am VERY disappointed.I used to own a little Canon Powershot, bought back in 2006, and only 5mp... I had hoped that this camera would at least be on par with my older Canon (which sadly went through the washing machine...hence needing a new one)Firstly, the wifi function on this camera is pretty much useless... It's not worth the frustration trying to get it to work.It is suppose to auto sync to my laptop to upload photo's whenever it's on and connected to the wifi... it never does that.It's suppose to allow me to post pics directly to FB or email etc... half the time it just won't send them, despite being connected to the wifi in my home.I got over the lack of wifi use and decided that it would still do the job as the 'diaper bag camera' I had bought it for if it works as a good point and shoot camera... BUT, it doesn't...I just about NEVER have clear images... image stabilization clearly is not effective and even if my subject is standing dead still, and right in front of me the pictures still have NOTHING on the quality of my old little Canon camera. Most of the time my images are poor quality and slightly or very blurry!It's almost useless for the purpose for which I need it...I'm completely frustrated and disappointed.. what a waste of money.Next time I'll stick to Canon!

Reviews.Title: More like 3 1/2 stars
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Preschool Teacher"
Reviews.Content: I was so excited at the idea of a camera with the ability to connect to WiFi. We are desperately trying to avoid buying a smart phone for our young teen and thought this would be the perfect cure! We were disappointed though, to find it was unable to connect with instagram, which was basically why she wanted a smart phone (and we wanted the WiFi camera) in the first place. It connected to Facebook like a dream, as well as to my Samsung galaxy phone (why this is helpful, I don't know).My favorite feature of the phone (besides the WiFi capability) is the little screen on the front. It's not only great for "selfies", but it also has attention grabbers geared for taking little one's photos. A cute little cartoon will come on the screen in front encouraging them to look at the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: HBHoops "Former Hard-Charger"
Reviews.Content: There are a lot of things I like about this camera: the size, the ease of use, the battery life, the myriad of settings that let you take some pretty cool pictures (especially the panorama mode and miniature setting), and the front facing LCD for self-portraits.  The picture quality is decent, not great, not bad.  In "Smart" mode, the pictures seem to be a little washed out and it does seem fairly easy to take a blurry picture, but still, the pictures are decent.One of the best things about the camera is backing up the pictures.  You can back them up wirelessly to your PC, post them to Facebook or YouTube, back them up to SkyDrive, send them in emails, pretty nice features for a camera at this price-point.

Reviews.Title: very nice camera
Reviews.Author: tara
Reviews.Content: I love the many features of this camera, including the many options of taking a picture. The price and quality of this camera would be hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Just alright...
Reviews.Author: 123Lexi
Reviews.Content: The pictures are often blurry. I have a 3 year old and I will get a few good pictures out of many that were taken. You have to be very still when taking pictures and whatever you're taking a picture of should be still as well.The wifi function is good though. You download an app to your phone or tablet, go to the app on the camera, connect to the camera on your phone/tablet, and then select your pictures from the camera. If you want your pictures to be sent from your camera to your device you have to set that up each time. It does not automatically happen like some reviewers seem to have expected.If you do not fully charge the battery every time you charge it the lens will get stuck and you cannot do anything on the camera. Not even get your pictures. You need to fully charge it, then remove the battery and put it back in, then turn it in.

Reviews.Title: Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Smart Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Tracy Rager
Reviews.Content: Love this camera!  It's very small, so I can carry it anywhere at any time, w/out it feeling like a burden.  Takes beautiful, crisp photos and the extras on this camera are wonderful.  It's amazing that a camera this small has so many features.  Great camera and great transaction!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Giselle Benitez "Giselle"
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for me because I dont really need a camera that takes really good quality photos. The quality is decent and I love that I can take pictures of myself without chopping my head out of the picture. Super handy, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Was very happy with the product until the zoom lens froze and locked up the camera interface.
Reviews.Author: Ray T
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with this camera when it first arrived.  It took amazing pictures and offered a suite of features that couldn't be beat for the price.  My rating for the camera for the first month I owned it would have been 5 stars.But on week 5, after having only been used on two occasions to take about 50 pictures, the zoom lens froze in the extended position which then locked up the interface.  Once that occurred, the camera was a dead stick and couldn't be used at all.  My only option was to pack it up and ship it at my expense back to Samsung for a warranty repair.  At the moment, I'm waiting for them to ship it back.The camera was never dropped, dinged, or put under any adverse conditions at all.  It arrived, I used it for two occasions without it ever leaving the house, and then it was placed back in the hard sided storage case that I purchased separately.I was disappointed that the camera hardware failed so quickly under such light use.  I really hope this was just a rare manufacturing defect and not an indication of the overall quality of the item.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Darcy
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  Compact so it fits easily into a pocket or purse, easy to use, takes good shots, has good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: LETICIA MACHADO
Reviews.Content: I'm completely satisfied with this camera! It has a great resolution and the screen in the front is perfect for selfies. Totally worth it!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Jasmine P
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a European vacation, and it delivered well, took execellent selfies, was easy to switch from pics to video, easy to carry being small. The features are awesome particularly the share wi-fi feature. Only two cons. It doesn't save my email address so I have to enter it every time I send a pic and it doesn't allow me to label my pics when posting them on facebook.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: sharon
Reviews.Content: We love this camera, all its functions are great. Still learning everything on it. LOVE that I can send straight to facebook or email.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: paulorojas
Reviews.Content: THE SERVICE OF AMAZON IS EXCELLENT, FAST, SECURE, THE PRODUCT IS ALL RIGTH, MODERN, HIGH TECNOLOGY THE PRICE IS CORRECT. I RECOMENDED FOR ALL . GOOD SERVICE

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Kerri
Reviews.Content: great camera, awesome featurs, and the front facing screen is super useful! I cant wait to use this on my vacation over memorial day!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ana Techera
Reviews.Content: Love the color!! The photos taken are excellent quality!! I trully recommended.The only inconvinient was the weather because the delivery was delayed due a snow storm

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a gift to carry on distance runs. Very compact and light weight. It takes great pictures and the front facing camera makes it super simple to take great self pics!

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG
Reviews.Author: Kelly & Matt Janssen
Reviews.Content: The brand name says it all, its a samsung ..... love it tne direct link is awesome love tbe quality

Reviews.Title: nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Corrie
Reviews.Content: i actually really like this camera. I'm using it mainly for a college photography class, but it is a great camera, easy to use, with LOTS of extra built in features. although i don't use the front facing camera as much as i thought i would, its still a cool feature to say i have! I'm very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Luis Molina
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice camera, light, do the job. I like the doble screen, it is very helpful, when I just want to take a picture of myself.

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed
Reviews.Author: stormi0611 "stormi0611"
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting this camera for years, before getting my smart phone, because of the dual camera and wifi features.  I bought it when it was on sale on Amazon and was really excited about getting it.  Opening the package I was very pleased with the small size of the camera, and the light weight.  But the first thing I didn't like about the camera was the zoom feature.  Instead of buttons it was a tiny lever on the shutter button.  My fingers are pretty small and it was hard for me to work it - I can't imagine it would be easier for anyone with "normal" sized fingers.  I was willing to let that issue go if the picture quality blew me away, but instead it was horrible.  Pictures were grainy and dark no matter which setting I used.  Were they completely horrible?  No.  But when my 6 year old Sony Cybershot camera and my iPhone take better pictures than a brand new camera I question why I even bought it.  I was going to replace my Sony with this, but instead returned it.  I'm very disappointed about it because I had wanted this little camera so long specifically for the dual camera and wifi.  But I'll just stick with my iPhone whenever I want to take pictures and use those features.

Reviews.Title: Tons of features
Reviews.Author: Nesha Dickerson
Reviews.Content: Gave this camera as a Christmas gift. It takes wonderful pictures and has tons of features for a "lower end" device. I plan on ordering another for myself.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: SSmith
Reviews.Content: I love all the features, especially the front facing screen for selfies. It takes great pictures and is very user friendly with all it's features.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Lynn Gates
Reviews.Content: Camera came in the color I selected and was perfect. The camera itself is very, very small. Much smaller than expected, but takes great pictures and offers a lot of bells and whistles. For the price, you get more than you would expect.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my 13 year old daughter...she loves taking pictures and now takes them more than ever!!!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: My daughters first camera and she loves it, It is just like mine in many ways but more cost efficient.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: Mychael Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: The best camera for this price. I am truly amazed with the DV150F! The easy share function on the DV150F works really well and really fast.

Reviews.Title: Brand name for low price
Reviews.Author: PinchiRichi "fufurufu"
Reviews.Content: A fantastic buy for a gift, next buy it will be for me.I will recommended to everyone looking for quality at bargain price

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah Price
Reviews.Content: Great camera. This is my second one. I had the first generation and this one is even better. The price is normally $200-299

Reviews.Title: Fun features
Reviews.Author: kat
Reviews.Content: the photos aren't great but the features make it worth keeping. the selfie-mode, the kids-mode, and the fact that i can upload these to my phone or internet immediately come in handy

Reviews.Title: small, compact camera
Reviews.Author: Michelle Nyquist
Reviews.Content: I love that this is a small camera with a lot of features. I love the wifi ability and it takes great pictures. I love the front facing camera. I got this as a supplement for my DSLR when I dont feel like lugging that around this is my go-to small camera

Reviews.Title: Awesome little point and shoot!
Reviews.Author: Cassie Keel
Reviews.Content: First, let me say that I have had a ton of point and shoot cameras. I try to keep one in my purse, just in case. I have been disappointed with my last 2 cameras as they have had issues with blurry pictures or lag between shots.This camera is under $100...and has really impressed me! Great shots...indoors and outdoors. Night photos also turn out surprisingly well! There are also many neat features. The front LCD screen is nice...you can make sure everything you want is in the shot! There is not an ungodly lag between pictures (major plus).I love this little camera! Awesome, crisp pictures from a lightweight camera...it is only cheap in price not quality.And unless you buy the bundle, you do need to purchase a memory card. But even with that additional expense...still a great deal!

Reviews.Title: So excited!
Reviews.Author: Cheers and Whatnot!
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get my lady a nice camera for Christmas, she's only been asking for one for the last two years, but the one I found wasn't quite as nice as I was hoping for. Then I got lucky and caught this beauty on sale for half it's normal price, putting it squarely in my price range. I can't wait for her to open it!

Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: lovlylizzy
Reviews.Content: the camera is really nice but the lens doesn't like to open all the way. that is ok tho I know how to get it to work.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: Kevin D. Finneran "Vernon Writer"
Reviews.Content: It's a nice small size, takes great pics, the dual view is awesome...I'm just an amateur looking to take fun pics, so it's great for me.  I also dig the ability to upload right to facebook.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality Pictures(Review from Guatemala)
Reviews.Author: Brian Ramirez
Reviews.Content: So far this camera has taken good quality pictures.  In day but in dark rooms, the pictures are a little dark.  However just with adjusting brightness, this is resolved.  The video recording option is good and video is good as well.  When enabling the Wi-Fi connectivity you can download the app from Play Store/App Store in your smartphone and when just finishing taking the picture, it immediately send it to your smartphone.  The only bad thing of this feature is that you can't take another picture until it finishes sending the picture you have taken to your phone. Overall this is a good product and I have nothing relevant against it.  Also it has panorama mode, and the front LCD Screen is an awesome feature.  There are many other features on this camera that makes it great.Review from Guatemala

Reviews.Title: DV150F VS DV300F
Reviews.Author: Just Me "Customer"
Reviews.Content: Initially I bought the DV300f and it broke within days of receiving it. I sent it back and got this one instead. Now, I've only had this one for a day...so hopefully it doesn't break on me! If so I'll be changing my review!First of all, this camera seems sturdier then the DV300f. The Wifi connectivity is much better in this model, so emailing and uploading pictures to Facebook is much better. In the Dv300f the wifi is hit or miss....which is really strange. This one has all the options, plus some as the Dv300f. The beauty palette is a fun feature to have too! I think the only option it doesn't have that the dv300f does, is the funny face app that warps your face. You really don't need that anyway!It's a fun little camera! I'm glad my dv300f broke now, as I like this one much more!

Reviews.Title: Small but mighty
Reviews.Author: Gretchen Collins
Reviews.Content: I have just started using my new camera.  There is a lot it can do and a lot to learn.  Going to Europe this summer so it will get a lot of use.

Reviews.Title: This camera is so fun!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Wolfe
Reviews.Content: I've bought three of these camera because of how fun they are to use.  The front screen for multi-person selfies is great, and the different scene options like panoramic and fun frames make every shot different.  I originally bought one for my daughter, thinking that the wifi would make posting pics quick and easy, but actually none of us have hooked up the wifi on our cameras, yet.The photos print beautifully.

Reviews.Title: WORKS
Reviews.Author: o anderson
Reviews.Content: This Cam is pretty cool I went to a wedding and I was able to take pictures and email that to Familiy and friends right away.

Reviews.Title: Great for the size and price
Reviews.Author: Fry Boy
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures outside, particularly when it's sunny.  Indoors, however, there's the customary point-and-shoot flash/exposure lag, which typically results in blurry pictures.  The camera is quite slim and a serviceable alterative to my large Canon digital SLR (EOS 20D).Due to the camera's small size, I found it a little challenging to zoom as quickly as I would have liked, mainly because my fingers were all jammed together, but that's not a deal-killer, just something you have to get used to.The camera is super slim and readily fit in my cargo shorts' pocket without adding significant bulk.  Great for the family's trip to NYC.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Keldon
Reviews.Content: Really takes terrible pictures. I've had a lot of cameras. This is one of the worse. It's a fun idea to have the screen in the front, but the pictures are washed out madness if you use the flash or blurry blobs if you don't. You choose. It's hard to get a decent picture.

Reviews.Title: Super mini-camera!
Reviews.Author: Suzee Sez "Suzee"
Reviews.Content: I've had 35mm and digital cameras for many, many years, and I was looking to buy a simple point & click for added versatility.  Since this one gave me the ability to take "selfies" too, I took a chance and bought it.  I was blown away by its performance!  Took it on my last vacation and it actually produced better results in low-light situations than my high-priced digital camera.  For example, I took an interior picture of a five story atrium at night and it faithfully captured all the intricate details of the ceiling.  Very happy I bought this camera!

Reviews.Title: Malfunctioned during set-up. Returned it.
Reviews.Author: Patty M "Patty"
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this camera and had ordered it to take a back-up for my trip to Nepal where I planned on bringing my larger digital SLR. Opening the box I was impressed with the size, weight and look of the camera. However, when setting it up the lens wouldn't go back in after shut-out. I repeatedly tried to get it to reset and kept getting the same error saying to contact the manufacturer if turning it on and off did not resolve the issue. If it was that finicky out of the box before even a single shot was taken, I decided it was going back. Returned to Amazon for a full refund. I would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: This is the best camera ever!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Teal Newman
Reviews.Content: Not only is it small, and portable. It also takes great pictures, has wifi, and a bunch of other really awesome features. There is a feature that will put makeup on your face, a motion feature, a feature that erases pimples, a feature that shows a little cartoon on the front screen so your kids will look at the camera and smile. It does split screen, has photos filters, has framing options! And to top it off has a rechargeable battery. I love this camera. Amazing!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: most pics are blurry.
Reviews.Author: DC SIR
Reviews.Content: We can take 400 pics and maybe 3 or 4 are not complete blur.  We use for pictures of dogs in rescue. So we can understand if they are moving. But even the sleeping photos are blurry. My smartphone takes better pictures.

Reviews.Title: A VERY cool camera!  Love it!
Reviews.Author: jodeg
Reviews.Content: What a cool camera!  My last digital camera is about 20 years old, so it was time!  My old camera still works great, but I wanted some of the new features this camera provides.  The Wi-Fi feature is wonderful, no more connecting the camera to the computer to download my pictures.  This camera is small, compact and easy to use.  Has a ton of features -- I think it does everything except clean my house for me!!  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Jazz
Reviews.Content: Everywhere else wants more money for the same product. Saved about 50 bucks. Camera is perfect, sleek and small. Easy to use and front screen very convenient

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera for self photos
Reviews.Author: Brian Sasser
Reviews.Content: We are very happy that we bought this camera, especially for "happy shots".  ;-)  We have always liked to turn the camera around and take pictures of ourselves, and it's hard to get the position JUST RIGHT -- not anymore!  Now we can see exactly what the photo will look like.  You push a button on the top to activate the front screen, and the camera seems a little slower processing when the front screen is activated, so we don't have it active unless we are using that feature.It is simple to use, yet has great options and takes great pictures.  There is a "Smart Auto" setting, and then there are also more detailed "scene" settings for different situations.  We like to play with the settings to see what works best in the situation we are in.  A great zoom for "faraway closeups", but not at night.  The flash doesn't go very far, so you're best to take faraway photos without the flash at night because it takes better advantage of what light is REALLY there -- if you use the flash at night, it makes things farther away look darker than they really are.We are really happy with the camera, and would definitely recommend it.  It was just a LITTLE more expensive than others, but the front screen makes that well worth it to us.  :-)  Oh, and you can also set the timer to take a delay picture if you are taking it from farther away, and you could still have the front screen activated so you could see right away, who needs to move in or to the side, or stop putting "bunny ears" over someone else's head ;-)

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: steve scavotto
Reviews.Content: This Camera SUX.........That's an overstatement, It is truly a piece of crap. I can not stress enough !!!Three pictures and the zoom locked up. JUNK

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Camera
Reviews.Author: Oxnard "Ox"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my granddaughter who wants to learn out to take photographs.  She loved it and I recommend this to all of the children.

Reviews.Content: Look this camera it work great An it takes good pictures it's the perfect gift So this product is a plus

I had to go to rite aid during the party and get one.. other than that the camera is great.. front screen is soo cool and the color was perfect for her , she just turned 10 so it's great that it's easy to use too..

Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: This is the secound Samsung camera along this line I have owned, and I was well pleased with the first one and this new one thatI bought from Amazon. The Point and Shoot is my type of camera and this one has so far done the job quite well. I like easy andsimple and that is what this camera is unless You want to go technical. It will fit what ever class of photography You are interested in.So if technical is what You want the electronics will let You go there. I have used the Wi Fi just twice and it does work , but that isnot something that will be important at this time. The front display is ok but I have  not used it. I was taking pictures of the fish inmy 55 gallon aquarium and I turned off the flash to stop the reflective glare and that is a good feature.My wife and I took the camera with my kids out to eat and my daughter was shooting with her cell phone and I was shooting withthis new Samsung DV150F and when I got home and down loaded her pictures from the cell phone and the ones fromthe Samsung I was really suprised to see how much better the pictures from This Samsung DV150F were.I had placed them on my computer desk top for display and Samsung DV150F Pictures were so much Sharper and Clear!Point and Shoot is the way I like to take Pictures and This Camera Does an Excellent Job of it!Pat

Reviews.Title: A xmas present for my sister

Reviews.Content: This camera is great for someone who is going to use to capture moments with friends family or even traveling. its great for somebody's first camera my sister loved it its so simple to use that's the best part.

Reviews.Title: good camera for that price

Reviews.Content: For this price is a good camera, but obviusly is not the best. Good quality of pictures, but realize that this is a snap and shoot, you dont have many options to configure the camera. Nice wifi connection.

Reviews.Title: Full-Featured Point & Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard La Barca
Reviews.Content: For the features this camera has, it is a pretty good deal for the $75.00 I paid. As for basic "auto" picture taking, it is about par to a $50.00 Kodak camera but, the video quality is much better. Having a front facing LCD is a nice touch for those (many) selfies we all like to take. The rear LCD is okay but, in direct sunlight, a bit difficult to see the image. I also wish I had full control of the flash which is not an option.THE REALLY GOOD: There are many preset-able picture formats so you don't have to make manual adjustments. This includes changeable MPs (picture size/quality) and specific scene choices as well as "magic" mode to add enhancements to pictures and even correct facial imperfections. There is a panoramic function to capture those vast scenic moments too. Also, with a 5X optical zoom, you can get pretty good close-ups (try not to move the camera!). With these capabilities and more, this camera is a winner!I haven't used the wifi since I find it easier just to take a picture with smart phone and send it immediately from the phone.FYI: If you wait a couple of seconds after selecting an item within the menu, the camera will show a little pop-up describing its function. I mention this because the camera does not come with a manual which is only available/downloadable online.Overall, this appears to be a solid, well-built camera with a good lens and many user changeable features.

Reviews.Title: Camera for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Bobbi Bradshaw
Reviews.Content: She loves it & it works great! Samsung is the best quality camera that I've ever used. Great Bargain, no regrets!

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it, now I get to keep mine.

Reviews.Content: My wife was always taking mine, an earlier version of this one,she loves the fact that it connects directly to facebook and other web sites, soshe can post immediately at any family activity as long as there is a WiFi connection.She just loves the beauty shot feature also.

First the front camera display is a great idea. but all it takes is blurry pictures while in that mode (this is disappointing being this is one of the main reasons I purchased this camera). It also does not take good pictures in dark areas. And last when uploading pictures to your computer it does not let you pick which ones to upload. It uploads all of them. Which depending on how often you upload could take a long time. Although it does let you choose what pictures you want to upload to your phone. But for $100.00 I really can not complain a whole lot.

Reviews.Title: Great camera

I love the wifi feature and the front view screen which is great for selfies. All the pictures come out great!. The front view screen is also great for taking pics of my nieces and nephews since it can play a cartoon to get there attention. A great price for a cool camera. My only dislike was that I could not email the videos I took, even though one was only 30 seconds long?? However, I am able to email multiple photos with no problem.

Reviews.Author: Schwartz
Reviews.Content: The features on the camera were easy to learn and they were alot of fun.  I used the camera panorama, the top and bottom face composition, the cartoon features. It was really great. The battery was so-so because my Canon HS100 has a longer battery life and slightly bigger battery. One day I took some pictures and tried to see them and but the camera kept reporting "file error". The battery was charged.  I went to print the pictures from the SD card and they printed. I tried to reformat but the camera kept reading "file error". Nobody else has reported this problem. I am returning it and will consider getting it again or a Canon. But I really like the features on this camera although the pictures are not as clear as the Canon point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. Easy to upload and transfer pictures.Pretty camera. Easy to use. Uses micro sd card anc sotre loads of pictures and videos.

Reviews.Title: This was a gift
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: My daughter, who has this camera, recommended it to me as a birthday gift for my sister, who has a disability, because the camera is easy to use and because of its features.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic and Useful Camera
Reviews.Author: Brophus
Reviews.Content: Camera takes quick pictures without sacrificing clarity or detail. Front facing screen is a must for couples that vacation on their own. Incredibly useful camera with a ton of features! This is the perfect point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Coll for doing self eee's
Reviews.Author: The Ripper "Xsheriffsdeputy"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera with many coool features like direct Email from camera.  Like the front viewing port in is definitely different

Reviews.Title: small but the best
Reviews.Author: palau
Reviews.Content: I love this camera..it is small but one of the best. both screen front and back really help.one of the best camera.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Tammy Dawe
Reviews.Content: I havent been able to enjoy this product as of yet because it didnt come with a memory card so the camera is unusable.  but I am looking forward  to it.

Reviews.Title: Good for selfie
Reviews.Author: R. D. Trajano
Reviews.Content: Dual LCD is handy when you want to get in the picture. A lot of fun features, like the billboards, tv shot, holiday card and etc.

Reviews.Title: OK for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wish I could force the flash. The photos are blury in low lighting.  Ok for the price. The front screen is nice with count down options and video clip to get young ones attention.Wish I could force the flash and not just let AUTO figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Easy to carry and use
Reviews.Author: Bean Bean
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when it approx. $70. I already have a pricey DSLR but with an active toddler, my hands are always full and I can't take the DSLR around as I would like to. I wanted a cheaper point & shoot that was (1) easy to carry and use and (2) small/light, while (3) taking better pictures than my iPhone 5.So far, I'm very pleased. It's very easy to use. The menu is very easy to navigate. I usually use the smart mode b/c it's the quickest. It also has some fun filters. I can carry this around in my diaper bag and quickly pull it out when I want to take a better picture than an iPhone pic. The shutter speed is pretty good - most of my pictures are coming out quite sharp and clear, even when my toddler is running around. It's not DSLR quality, of course, but you're not paying DSLR prices and so far, this camera is proving to be an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Great idea for a point and shoot camera...make it a smart wifi enabled camera...it's the wave of the future!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift and wish I purchased one for me.  It was a deal of the day...great idea for a point and shoot camera-  buy one with wifi capabilities!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: ahmed
Reviews.Content: Very light and shooting speed is awesome, makeup option will make you a movie star......really like it...and i will bring another one as a gift for my sister

Reviews.Title: colorblind?
Reviews.Author: jerilyn maty
Reviews.Content: I love this camera- but was very disappointed when I received the blue/black camera instead of the white one that I ordered. Just a little reminder to check your orders description before you send them out.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Nanney "izzy's mom"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 10 year old for her birthday and she loves it.  Easy for her to use and fun with the front view finder.

Reviews.Title: Samsung always reliable
Reviews.Author: Victor Buenrostro
Reviews.Content: Meets perfectly my expectations. Sure choice price vs performance but with powerfull smartphones cameras available everywhere might be a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Perfect pocket camera
Reviews.Author: firewalker_john
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the putting in the pocket for those quick pictures and it takes great pictures. even smaller would be better.

Reviews.Title: Would Like To Use, But Can't Charge--Adapter Not For US Electrical Outlets
Reviews.Author: Jody Williams
Reviews.Content: I would love to use my new camera, but the battery charger does not have an adapter that will plug into US electrical sockets.  What's up with that?  No where in the product description does it say that the plug in will require an international adapter.  So, off to purchase something that will allow me to plug in the cord and charge the battery.  Amazon, I expected better than that!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Juan Valencia
Reviews.Content: This is the best point and shoot camera by far you can buy if you are looking something to take to a travel

Reviews.Title: Samsung Camera w/Wifi
Reviews.Author: atorp
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera.  Used it a few times now for videos and the zoom is absolutely amazing!  I am enjoying this camera!

Reviews.Title: It does not come with a memory card
Reviews.Author: Carol Fergueson
Reviews.Content: It is a great camera. I have not had it too long and was a little dispointed that it did not come with a memory card.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: carmen
Reviews.Content: takes great pics and love the size , and so easy to use, great camera for the money, love it

Reviews.Title: amazing features
Reviews.Author: K. O.
Reviews.Content: very nice size, sleek, takes excellent photos, front lcd panel is a nice touch. it syncs with my phone and i can snap the shot in my phone by using the camera lens. has so may features i havent even begun to use them all yet...its a "smart" camera maybe smarter than me but definately worth the price.Love it!

Reviews.Title: Good camera but no user-friendly features.
Reviews.Author: Gee Gee
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera and am still learning the features. This review is for the electronically-challenged like me since I ALWAYS need to call someone for help with everything electronic!What I like:*It is small, light-weight, and fits well in my purse.*Pictures are automatically sent to my smart-phone. (You have to download an app before this feature will work.)*Takes video.*I can take "selfies" with ease.*Wi-fi capability.What I did NOT like:*No manual, only a quick-start guide that does not explain any of the features. There is a full manual available on various websites, but it has 100+ pages so I only printed the pages that I needed.)*I had to buy a memory card in addition to the camera.*Not "user friendly" if you have limited experience with digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: DEISI GONZALEZ ROJAS
Reviews.Content: Good morning please review products before sending them, I just got the camera and the lens tries to leave but gets stuck and fails, to bad I lost my money on this product, please re-checked for the products so that the customer does not waste time or money.

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: Willard D. Blair
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for a daughter and she loves it. Now, what will she expect next year? We'll see.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera...outside.
Reviews.Author: William Ketchem
Reviews.Content: I've used this camera a few times now so I can now review it. Terrific camera when shooting outside. Indoors, with or without flash, it is terrible. I like the wireless features that work with my cell phone. Iam now on the market for another camera. Indoors is important, I guess I'll have to pay.

Reviews.Title: Incorrect charger included!
Reviews.Author: FK001
Reviews.Content: Package arrived wet. Fortunately the camera and battery, etc. were is plastic pouches and remained dry. After getting things organized, I discovereed that the charger has a European style plug, will not fit the standard outlet without an adapter. I can of course use the USB port and charge the battery that way but what an inconveninece!The instructions with the camera are minimal and printed in what may be 00 font size on a folded up sheet of flimsy paper. So upset I have not yet tried out the camera since charging up the battery. Such a pain to return it after investing time getting it organized.No inspection or Quality Control at the Distrib Center......

Reviews.Title: The best camera ever made!!!
Reviews.Author: GODCHILD
Reviews.Content: I love this camera it's the best it has wifi I am having so much fun It's so so so amazing to me I love it be blessed!!!

Reviews.Title: Haven't used it yet.
Reviews.Author: 1st Grambo "1st Grambo"
Reviews.Content: Can't seem to find my mini-card, and have not even tried to use the camera yet.  It's very small and compact and seems to have a lot of features.

Reviews.Title: samsung camera
Reviews.Author: Tristyn Johnson
Reviews.Content: I gave this 5 stars..The color is so vivid and pretty. The camera is simple and very user friendly. I havent taken many pictures yet because I purchased it for a upcoming trip. Although I wish it were touch screen, I am still satisfied with my purchase. I read that it does take great photos so I would recommend this to anyone..

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Maryanne Salera "Maryanne"
Reviews.Content: I ended up finding my other Casio Camera which I love. I sold this camera on Craig's List. Didn't like it and it doesn't work with out a memory card. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality indoors
Reviews.Author: Roman Kharkovski
Reviews.Content: Outside pictures are ok, but when I compared this camera with flash indoors, my 4 years old Canon IS1200 took better pictures. I returned the product and upgraded to Canon S120 and I am loving it :-) Yes, these are in very different price categories, but I prefer quality over price and the $350 was well worth it for it. The only thing is the poor battery life on S120...

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Christine Benson
Reviews.Content: Great pictures!  Love that it is so small that I can carry it anywhere especially slipped into my pocket.  Has a good zoom.  I really love the duel screen so when I take a picture of myself or husband and me I can really see what it will look like--that is a great feature!  I did not get the bigger memory card but am going to because there have been a few times I could not take pictures until I downloaded.  Definetly get a bigger memory card.I love my little camera!  Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: No Memory Card
Reviews.Author: TLT
Reviews.Content: I was stunned to find no memory card on the camera.  WHY would they not include this....you take it out of the box expecting to start using it right away and you can't.  Hoping, once I get the memory card, the camera is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Camera buttons too small for my big hands.
Reviews.Author: Hector
Reviews.Content: The top zoom button is too small to use.The camera feels like cheap plastic.The instructions book words too small to read.

Reviews.Title: very recommended
Reviews.Author: Lucas
Reviews.Content: It was a clever purchase because it has a lot of applications for pictures and videos. I recommend it very much!!

Reviews.Title: Highly Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Honi M. Gottlieb
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera with the expectation of using it on my trip to NYC .. I got the camera in February and took the camera out yesterday ..tried  using it .. Today while in NYC camera has something in else that is showing up in photo like either missing pixels or some malfunction .. Wanted to return it but iI was told I can not ... I will never purchase from seller again nor will I  recommend.. There is no reason why a brand new camera right out of the box should not work perfectly .. Very unhappy !!!!

Reviews.Title: Not Sent The Correct Item
Reviews.Author: S. Omar "Nosiop Sag"
Reviews.Content: I am so disappointed. When I opened the box it did not contain the Samsung DV150F that I ordered and paid for. I received a totally different digital camera, which was a Samsung, but not the correct model. So I'm sending it back. What an inconvenience this has caused.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Charger
Reviews.Author: Richard J. Heath
Reviews.Content: Purchased this from Amazon.com.  Charger is Japanese style, not American.  How can I review it if I can't even charge it and use it???  Very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: PLEASE READ MY UNBIASED REVIEW BEFORE PURCHASING THIS ITEM!
Reviews.Author: Philly Grad Student  On the Go
Reviews.Content: First of all, I did a lot of research into brands and pricing for a digi cam before finally deciding on this one due to its good reviews. Actually, I stumbled across this one and was immediately impressed with the specs (16 megapixels and it being wi-fi). I knew I wanted a good quality of megapixel and wi-fi to seamlessly upload to social media and email without having to attach the cam to my laptop.What I love:A front AND rear LCD screen.The plum color is stunning and it is wi-fi.What I hate:The pic quality sucks.Rear LCD screen is supposedly 2.7 but looks incredibly small.  Worse, it wouldn't connect to my home wi-fi network. I tried it at least 5 to six times. Called Samsung tech support and the rep told me to try to connect via a different wi-fi network (How could I as I have one network at home and all my neighbor's are security protected?). Then I was told to try to disable my network security key THEN try to connect (This is impossible and makes no sense as how could one connect to a wi-fi without its security key?). Subsequently, in another phone call, a very rude and nasty tech support rep told me to change the channel of my router to "either 1 or 6 but not 11" and when asked how to go about doing that, I was told that they couldn't offer assistance in that and I'd have to contact my ISP. I contacted my ISP only to be told that only the manufacturer of the router could assist. Frustrated, I googled how to change my router's channel. HUGE MISTAKE! This erased all my router's settings (my network security key, network name, etc) as well as also rendering my internet offline and unable to have internet access. After a 4 and a half hour and 2 phone call tech session with the manufacturer of my router, I FINALLY was able to restore my internet connectivity. The rep stated that Samsung should have NEVER told me under any circumstances to alter my router's settings. Finally, the router tech support rep disabled a certain feature in the router settings and I was able to connect to my wi-fi network (or so I thought).....WRONG! After hanging up with the rep, I was once again, unable to connect with my wi-fi network. Clearly the cam was either defective or there is some setting on the cam or my network that prohibits or doesn't allow the cam to connect with my network.  The customer service/support I received from Samsung was appallingly sub-par. Unacceptable for a company with the supposed stellar reputation as Samsung. (I own a Samsung Galaxy Note II). Consequently, I returned the camera and will either purchase a Nikon or Canon. The 8 megapixel camera on my phone was of a more superior quality than this cam! The only reason I gave it two instead of one star is because of the color, features and potential. Be warned as 100 bucks is by no means a cheap investment for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Pure junk
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: Bought it, returned it. Pictures are blurry with the slightest movement. It doesn't even come close to being a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality, Poor wifi connections
Reviews.Author: Ryan Law
Reviews.Content: I purchased this point and shoot for my wife to enable direct uploading to FB and her computer.  Setup was easy, but the actual process of uploading pictures was cumbersome and took way too long.  Must have been 5+ steps and each time you have to connect to a wi-fi network.  Not only that, but the picture quality was terrible.  It is possible we weren't optimizing the pictures we were taking, but this is a point and shoot camera.  That is all I wanted to use it for.  Leave it in auto, point and shoot.  We were coming from a Canon Powershot SD1000 that was several years old.  Well, I am glad we hung on to the Canon, because I ended up selling this Samsung camera on that auction site and going back to the Canon.  Much better image quality.

Reviews.Title: Cutest Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: G. Haywood "Reader"
Reviews.Content: This is the cutest thing that I have ever seen.  I got the white one for a great "daily deal" price.  I have not used it yet to take pictures because I do not have a memory card, but sakes a live this thing is cute!!!

Reviews.Title: A Truly Sad Excuse for a Point and Shoot Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Ahmed "Ahmed"
Reviews.Content: This is the most disappointing excuse for a camera I have ever used.  My attraction to it was the front LCD screen, as I was going to a wedding that my young nephews were attending.  I thought the front screen would be fun for them and I thought it was an interesting feature.Being in the camera business for forty years, I knew I wasn't buying a $5,000 camera.  I DID expect to get a basic point and shoot camera that could create an acceptable 5 X 7 inch print.  As it turns out, I am ill that I took this camera to the wedding rather than buying a $5 disposable film camera or simply using my iPhone.Other problems with the camera are that the battery only lasts about 200 images before it has to be recharged again; it requires that you recharge the battery while inside the camera, as there is no separate AC charger provided;  the built in flash only has a range of about 8 feet even as 400 ISO; and it uses a micro SD card, which should have been clearly disclosed in the Amazon write-up. I had to run to Radio Shack to buy a micro SD card, which was ridiculously expensive.Do not waste your money on this camera.  EVERY one of the 200 images I took tonight are not sharp enough for 4 X 6 prints.  If you are ONLY going to view the images you create on an iPhone you are viewing from 5 feet away, then possibly consider it only if you are real fan of useless bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: do not buy this item, blotchy focus
Reviews.Author: John Kerr
Reviews.Content: the focus is blotchy, turns out a friend has one also, and their camera is also blotchy in its focus, do not buy this item

Reviews.Title: Dont buy this, it's cheapo and has bad quality!
Reviews.Author: P. Lau
Reviews.Content: Bad camera.Always out of focus.The face detection can't detect human with hat on or small baby face!!!!The battery drains so fast if you turn on the wifi!!!Uses micro SD instead of normally seen SD card!!!Compatibility problem with Sandisk micro SD card!!For god's sake, get a better brand. This camera for sissy or nub.

Reviews.Title: NO internal memory and NO memory card included
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: When I received this camera, I began taking pictures only to find the internal memory on this camera only allows for 2- that's right 2 photos to be taken before declaring the memory full.  If the internal memory is so low, a memory card should be automatically included with the product.  How lame.

Reviews.Title: Very pretty
Reviews.Author: Ruth Householder
Reviews.Content: It's my fault.  I am 81 and don't know much about digital cameras.  I had to take it to a store to figure out what I needed to do to get it working.  It's a beautiful little camera and I am sure I will learn to love it.

Reviews.Title: Mini Fingers
Reviews.Author: gail
Reviews.Content: The camera was cute but it's made for those with tiny hands and fingers. Kind of hard for an adult to reach all the little buttons. The front screen is so tiny it would be hard to take more than 2 people in the photo. I bought for a trip with 2 of my grand kids an had to seen it back I will use my I Pad instead.

Reviews.Title: NEVER had it want to try it
Reviews.Author: Kaci Boling
Reviews.Content: I DON't know if  it is good or bad so I choose in between. I just DON't like cameras I love them so I want the plum colored on

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Seraph
Reviews.Content: I got this camera because I thought it was a good deal.  When I got it, I realized that the quality was not what I expected of a Samsung product.  Still learning how to use it, which says a lot.  When I got it, it was labeled for Central America or something to that extent.  Overall I am dissatisfied with this buy.  It actually took longer to leave the facility than to ship to me.

Reviews.Title: I am angry at Samsung and their stupid policy
Reviews.Author: Deborah Coleman
Reviews.Content: This product has no users manuel....I looked for a long time to find one online and finally called samsung to request a users manauel...This product has o many features and i am clueless how to use it.  They will not...they sent me a link and said i have to print out the 163 page manuel if i want one. ///i am furious...and will never buy another Samsung product again...ever.  If i buy a expensive peice of equiptment ..i expect good diretions on how to use it.....This camera should have been fun ...and i hate it now

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work as Described
Reviews.Author: Daphne B. Goodyear
Reviews.Content: The directions that come with this camera are terrible, terrible, terrible. Spent an hour on my own trying to figure out how to use the wifi feature and could not.  This is the main reason this camera was purchased.  Then I spent a good 30 minutes on the Samsung Chat Live feature with a "customer service" person trying to understand the directions for sending a picture.  The cs person was incompetent.  She did not know what the home screen was.  By the time I logged off I was more confused than when the communication began.  This Samsung person told me I need a smartphone to use the wifi feature effectively.  Don't know if this is true, but I have no more time to spend figuring out how to use this camera.  I love Samsung products, but they need to have customer service personnel who know how to help their customers.  I am returning the camera to Amazon.Samsung DV150F Dual-View Smart Digital Camera (Black)
